jsonBody.title: Witcher 2
jsonBody.shortDescription: Geralt defends Henselt from two witcher assassins, and assists Dethmold, a mage and royal advisor to King Henselt, in a necromancy ritual to discover they are in league with SÃ­le de Tansarville, who has already fled to Loc Muinne with fellow sorceress Philippa Eilhart and entranced rebel leader Saskia in tow.

jsonBody.title: Dark Souls II
jsonBody.shortDescription: Experience a dark fantasy world filled with challenging enemies and deep lore. As the Ashen One, players must battle formidable foes to rekindle the flames and restore the world.
